message.content:
1. One parent of each patient was chosen to complete the BCFPI follow-up form.
2. The BCFPI follow-up form was completed one month after discharge.
3. The BCFPI follow-up form was completed using either IVR or postal survey.
4. 40 parents completed the BCFPI follow-up form using IVR.
5. 40 parents completed the BCFPI follow-up form using a postal survey.

messages.content:
Statement: One parent of each of the patients was randomized to complete the BCFPI follow-up form, using either IVR (n = 40) or postal survey (n = 40) one month after discharge.

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
